item.title: AlpacaHack Round 2 (Web) - CaaS (Cow as a Service)
item.description: Overview I’ve initially thought that this is a JavaScript command injection challenge, since that we have the flag located at the root and we have a binary that is being executed (/usr/games/cowsay). I began to read the documentation of google/zx , but after a while I didn’t find anything that could lead to command injection. Then I’ve started to explore the binary itself /usr/games/cowsay, I also setup a verbose output for ZX as I’ve read the documentation.
